name: Dropped Item
description: A physical item dropped in the world. Can be collected by players.

name: Experience Orb
description: Glowing spheres that provide XP for enchanting and repairs.

name: Area Effect Cloud
description: Lingering potion effect zone that damages entities.

name: Elder Guardian
description: Boss guardian in ocean monuments. Causes Mining Fatigue.

name: Wither Skeleton
description: Nether skeleton with stone swords. Drops coal and skulls.

name: Stray
description: Icy skeleton that shoots Slowness arrows.

name: Egg
description: Throwable chicken egg with small spawn chance.

name: Lead Knot
description: Leash attachment point on fences for animals.

name: Painting
description: Decorative wall art with random sizes/themes.

name: Arrow
description: Standard projectile from bows.

name: Snowball
description: Throwable projectile that knocks back entities.

name: Ghast Fireball
description: Explosive projectile fired by Ghasts.

name: Blaze Fireball
description: Fire projectile from Blazes in Nether fortresses.

name: Ender Pearl
description: Throwable teleportation item with ender particles.

name: Eye of Ender
description: Navigation item that locates End portals.

name: Splash Potion
description: Throwable potion with area-of-effect.

name: Bottle o' Enchanting
description: Throwable XP container from trading.

name: Item Frame
description: Wall-mounted display for items/maps.

name: Wither Skull
description: Projectile fired by the Wither boss.

name: Primed TNT
description: Explosive block with fuse timer.

name: Falling Block
description: Gravity-affected block like sand or gravel.

name: Firework Rocket
description: Launchable fireworks for visuals/elytra boosting.

name: Husk
description: Desert zombie causing Hunger effect.

name: Spectral Arrow
description: Arrow that creates glowing target outline.

name: Shulker Bullet
description: Homing projectile from Shulkers in End cities.

name: Dragon Fireball
description: Ender Dragon's explosive purple fireball.

name: Zombie Villager
description: Curable zombie variant of villagers.

name: Skeleton Horse
description: Undead horse spawned during thunderstorms.

name: Zombie Horse
description: Unridable undead horse variant.

name: Armor Stand
description: Customizable mannequin for displaying gear.

name: Donkey
description: Rideable mob with chest storage capacity.

name: Mule
description: Donkey-horse hybrid with storage capacity.

name: Evocation Fangs
description: Attack summoned by Evokers in woodland mansions.

name: Evoker
description: Spell-casting illager that summons fangs and vexes.

name: Vex
description: Ghostly minion summoned by Evokers.

name: Vindicator
description: Axe-wielding illager from woodland mansions.

name: Illusioner
description: Unused illager mob with invisibility spells.

name: Minecart with Command Block
description: Minecart with command block functionality.

name: Boat
description: Wooden water vehicle for quick travel.

name: Minecart
description: Basic rail vehicle for transportation.

name: Storage Minecart
description: Minecart with 27-slot storage capacity.

name: Powered Minecart
description: Minecart powered by furnace engine.

name: Minecart with TNT
description: Explosive minecart activated by rails.

name: Minecart with Hopper
description: Minecart that collects items through hoppers.

name: Minecart with Spawner
description: Minecart containing mob spawner.

name: Creeper
description: Explosive green mob with silent approach.

name: Skeleton
description: Bow-wielding undead mob vulnerable to sunlight.

name: Spider
description: Hostile cave-dwelling arachnid.

name: Giant Zombie
description: Unused oversized zombie variant.

name: Zombie
description: Common undead mob that burns in sunlight.

name: Slime
description: Bouncy green mob that splits when killed.

name: Ghast
description: Floating Nether mob that shoots fireballs.

name: Zombie Pigman
description: Neutral Nether mob (legacy name).

name: Enderman
description: Tall neutral mob that teleports and carries blocks.

name: Cave Spider
description: Poisonous spider variant found in mineshafts.

name: Silverfish
description: Small mob hiding in monster eggs within stone.

name: Blaze
description: Nether fortress mob that shoots fire charges.

name: Magma Cube
description: Nether lava slime that splits when defeated.

name: Ender Dragon
description: Final boss mob of Minecraft in the End dimension.

name: Wither
description: Flying three-headed boss that destroys blocks.

name: Bat
description: Passive cave-dwelling ambient mob.

name: Witch
description: Swamp-dwelling mob that throws harmful potions.

name: Endermite
description: Small End dimension pest hated by Endermen.

name: Guardian
description: Underwater mob that shoots laser beams.

name: Shulker
description: End city mob that shoots levitation projectiles.

name: Pig
description: Rideable passive mob attracted to carrots.

name: Sheep
description: Wool-producing mob that can be dyed different colors.

name: Cow
description: Source of leather, milk, and beef. Found in grassy biomes.

name: Chicken
description: Egg-laying bird that drops feathers and raw chicken.

name: Squid
description: Aquatic mob that emits ink clouds when attacked.

name: Wolf
description: Tamable companion that attacks hostile mobs when tamed.

name: Mooshroom
description: Mushroom-covered cow variant exclusive to mushroom islands.

name: Snow Golem
description: Utility mob that throws snowballs at enemies and melts in warm biomes.

name: Ocelot
description: Shy jungle cat that can be tamed with raw fish.

name: Iron Golem
description: Protective construct that defends villages from threats.

name: Horse
description: Rideable mob with varying speeds, colors, and jump heights.

name: Rabbit
description: Small hopper that drops rabbit hide and rare rabbit's foot.

name: Polar Bear
description: Neutral arctic mob that becomes aggressive if cubs are nearby.

name: Llama
description: Caravan animal that can be equipped with decorative carpets.

name: Llama Spit
description: Projectile attack used by llamas when provoked.

name: Parrot
description: Colorful tamable bird that mimics nearby mob sounds.

name: Villager
description: Trading NPC with profession-specific trades and outfits.

name: Ender Crystal
description: Floating crystal used to heal the Ender Dragon in the End dimension.
